category.name: Schedule Manager
category.category_description: Allows configuring of Schedule Manager functionality.

preference.name: SM_Hours_Per_Year_Preference
preference.preference_description: Defines the number of work hours per year, as used for calculating calendar end dates. The value can vary depending on the site (e.g 52 weeks * 40 hrs for the US, 52 weeks * 37.5 hrs for the UK). The default value is 2080.
